name: Update Frontend Docs on Code Changes
description: Automatically updates frontend documentation when core Python files are modified

action.message:
The file ${filePath} has been saved with changes. Please review the changes in this file and update the frontend documentation in the frontend-docs directory to reflect any API changes, new features, or modified behavior. Focus on:

1. API Reference pages - update function signatures, parameters, and return types
2. Getting Started guide - update if there are new initialization patterns or basic usage changes
3. Examples - update code examples if the API has changed
4. Feature documentation - add or update documentation for new or modified features

Make sure the documentation follows the frontend style guide and maintains consistency with existing content.
